title: Is the Middle Class within Reach for Middle-Income Families?
content: Note:  Wealth values are reported in 2018 dollars using personal consumption expenditures prices.      Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Distributional Financial Accounts; Bureau of Economic Analysis; calculations by Board staff.   0  5,000  10,000  15,000  20,000  25,000  30,000  35,000  40,000  45,000  1989:Q3 1992:Q3 1995:Q3 1998:Q3 2001:Q3 2004:Q3 2007:Q3 2010:Q3 2013:Q3 2016:Q3  Figure 12.
